projects.name: SMART Project (CSR)
projects.description: Organized health and eye check-up camps in collaboration with medical professionals, providing essential healthcare services to villagers and underprivileged children. projects.name: CMAPS Project
projects.description: Conducted needs assessment on college students' climate action attitudes. Collaborated with YLAC, leveraging interviews and expert consultations. Findings informed youth engagement strategies for environmental sustainability.
